net.stemkoski.bagel

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.stemkoski.bagel.Entity
      • net.stemkoski.bagel.Sprite

  • public class Sprite
extends Entity
    Sprites represent game world entities: characters, environment, items, obstacles, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double x,
                        double y)
        Set the coordinates of the center of this sprite.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of center of sprite
        y - y-coordinate of center of sprite

      • moveBy

        public void moveBy(double deltaX,
                   double deltaY)
        Move this sprite by the specified amounts.
        Parameters:
        deltaX - amount to move sprite along x direction
        deltaY - amount to move sprite along y direction

      • setTexture

        public void setTexture(Texture tex)
        Set the texture to be displayed when rendering this sprite. Also sets width and height of this sprite.
        Parameters:
        tex - texture to use for this sprite

      • setSize

        public void setSize(double width,
                    double height)
        Set size to use when for boundary and when drawing this sprite
        Parameters:
        width - width of sprite
        height - height of sprite

      • draw

        void draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext context)
        Render this sprite to a canvas using specified parameters
        Overrides:
        draw in class Entity
        Parameters:
        context - GraphicsContext object that handles drawing to the canvas

      • getBoundary

        Rectangle getBoundary()
        Get boundary shape for this sprite, adjusted according to current position. Angle of rotation has no effect on the boundary.
        Returns:
        boundary shape for this sprite

      • isOverlapping

        public boolean isOverlapping(Sprite other)
        Check if this sprite is overlapping another sprite.
        Parameters:
        other - sprite to check for overlap with
        Returns:
        true if this sprite overlaps other sprite

      • preventOverlap

        public void preventOverlap(Sprite other)
        Prevent this sprite from overlapping another sprite.
        Parameters:
        other - sprite to prevent overlap with

      • rotateBy

        public void rotateBy(double deltaAngle)
        Rotate sprite by the specified angle.
        Parameters:
        deltaAngle - the angle (in degrees) to rotate this sprite

      • moveAtAngle

        public void moveAtAngle(double distance,
                        double angleDegrees)
        Move sprite by the specified distance at the specified angle.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance to move this sprite
        angleDegrees - the angle (in degrees) along which to move this sprite

      • moveForward

        public void moveForward(double distance)
        Move sprite forward by the specified distance at current angle.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance to move this sprite

      • boundToScreen

        public void boundToScreen(double screenWidth,
                          double screenHeight)
        Keep sprite completely within screen bounds by adjusting position if necessary.
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - width of screen
        screenHeight - height of screen

      • wrapToScreen

        public void wrapToScreen(double screenWidth,
                         double screenHeight)
        If sprite moves completely beyond one edge of the screen, adjust position so that it reappears by opposite edge of the screen.
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - width of screen
        screenHeight - height of screen

      • isOnScreen

        public boolean isOnScreen(double screenWidth,
                          double screenHeight)
        Check if sprite (boundary rectangle) remains on screen
        Parameters:
        screenWidth - width of screen
        screenHeight - height of screen
        Returns:
        true, if part of sprite (boundary rectangle) remains on screen

      • setPhysics

        public void setPhysics(double accValue,
                       double maxSpeed,
                       double decValue)
        Initialize physics object and corresponding values.
        Parameters:
        accValue - acceleration value
        maxSpeed - maximum speed
        decValue - deceleration value

      • bounceAgainst

        public void bounceAgainst(Sprite other)
        Simulate this sprite bouncing off other sprite. Only use after checking isOverlapping(Sprite). Requires physics object to be initialized.
        Parameters:
        other - Sprite acting as solid surface to bounce against

      • setAnimation

        public void setAnimation(Animation anim)
        Set the animation to be used by this Sprite. Also sets texture, width, and height.
        Parameters:
        anim - Animation to be used by this Sprite

      • addAction

        public void addAction(Action a)
        Add an Action to this Sprite. Actions are automatically run.
        Parameters:
        a - action to add to this sprite

      • act

        public void act(double deltaTime)
        Run any Action objects added to this Sprite. Actions are run in parallel (except for those created with ActionFactory.sequence(Action...) and removed from the Sprite when they are finished.
        Overrides:
        act in class Entity
        Parameters:
        deltaTime - amount of time that has passed since the last iteration of the game loop
